content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

Tuesday April 29, 2025 

Today is a “C” Day 

  

  •  Best Buddies will meet on Wednesday April 30th at 2:20-3pm in the LGR. Can’t wait to see you there! 

 

 *Today’s lunch is ultimate walking nachos, black bean corn salsa and rainbow pepper sticks 

  Be Safe, Be Respectful, Be responsible and Be KIND! 

 As Always, make it a great day or not… the choice is yours.
